ComicInfo.Title: Cat
ComicInfo.Summary:
Gray Morrow did the writing, penciling, inking & lettering for all comic features in the book except the final feature which was written by Phil Sueling but with all the art done by Morrow.
The Cat - comic story / 6 pages - A professional cat burglar eyes a large collection of jewels from a rich madman who has total control over his niece.
A Stab in the Dark - 1 page text story (uncredited)
Missing Link - comic story / 5 pages - Looking to find the missing link between the Neanderthals and the Cro-Magnons, Dr. Burris creates a time machine and journeys back in time. He becomes stranded in the past and eventually befriends a group of Neanderthals.
Immortality Factor - comic story / 5 pages - A man comes to believe that his institutionalized sister did not die of a heart attack as her doctor reported. [reprinted in Dracula & Co 2 ]
Haunted Gallery - comic story / 6 pages - A lawyer with his eyes on an old man's money, niece, and museum kills the old man, only to have the paintings in the museum haunt him for his crime.
Essays into the Supernatural / comic story / 1 page [reprinted in Archie's Super Hero Special #1]
